Systems:

ACE

MISSILE LAUNCHER

No description given.

BARREL ROLL

Trigger:A melee or ranged attack hits the Ace.
The Ace performs a barrel roll, flying 6 spaces in any direction and causing the attack to miss. This movement ignores engagement and does not provoke reactions.

MISSILE SWARM

This weapon deals double damage to characters with Lock On and doesn’t affect allied characters.

CHAFF LAUNCHERS

After using Barrel Roll, the Ace counts as being in soft cover until the end of their next turn; additionally, Barrel Roll can be used against tech attacks.

SHIP

skimmer

The Ship moves normally in aquatic environments. It gains Immunity to Immobilized, Stunned and Prone.

CREW

The Ship has at least two crewmembers.

ARMORED HULL

The Ship gains +5 HP.

NO MANIPULATORS

The Ship can’t pick up objects, manipulate objects or the environment, or Grapple.

LIMITED MELEE ATTACKS

The Ship can’t make melee attacks other than Ram.

TRANSPORT

The Ship can transport one Squad or characters whose combined Size is less than its own Size.
